title: Don’t You Need My Kiss for Your Youth? - Novel Updates
author: Usagiya Supon   うさぎやすぽん
description:
Isn't it sad that I'm in high school and I've never kissed?
 
　I'm proud to be a perfectionist and aspire to be a doctor, but I, Kotaro Kuroki, am struggling.
 
　Is kissing necessary for a perfect life...? No, love and kissing are confusing to me!
 
　Then I met Hino Koyuki, a classmate rumoured to be 'the girl who kisses everyone,' and by chance, I ended up playing a certain game with this girl.
 
'Hey, how about I kiss you if I lose?'
 
'Geez!'
 
'Haha, Kuroki, that's funny... So do you want to?'
 
'Who needs a kiss?' I thought, but I couldn't take my eyes off her.
 
　I'm sure she has something that I don't, yet why does her smile seem so sad sometimes?
 
　--There are many kinds of people in this world: unrealistic, slu*ts, shady, and b*tches.
 
　In this world, there are people who suffer from 'being abnormal.'
 
　But who in the world has the right to call it a disease?
 
　A coming-of-age romantic comedy that goes back to the basics and prescribes for all the misfits!

>
